title: Designing Activity-Based STEM Mathematics Pedagogy for K-12 Education

context.prior_knowledge: Elementary mathematics education fundamentals and practical teaching experience
context.additional_context: Process for pre-service teachers to develop STEM-based math lesson design competencies through asynchronous LMS accessible in smartphone environments

learning_goals: Learners can explain a math lesson design process that reflects STEM education principles, divided into three or more stages.
Learners can create two or more math lesson scenarios applying activity-based learning strategies.
Learners can perform peer assessment and feedback processes using video-based learning materials.
Learners can modify participation strategies by analyzing group engagement metrics.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
